Poems, &c. upon several occasions both English and Latin, &c. / composed at several times by Mr. John Milton ; with a small tractate of education to Mr. Hartlib. Milton, John, 1608-1674.
[8], 165, 117, [5] p.
Printed for Tho. Dring ..., London : 1673.
Latin poems have separate paging and special t.p. with title: Joannis Miltoni Londinensis poemata. Errata: p. [8] Advertisement: [5] p. at end. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
